channel.title: PulseGeek
channel.description: Tech news, gaming, and geek culture in one pulse

item.title: LOD Setup Best Practices: Detail Where It Matters
item.description: Learn practical LOD setup best practices for game assets, including screen-size metrics, crossfade transitions, impostors, and animation simplification to balance performance and visual quality.

item.title: Adaptive Difficulty with Procedural Systems: Calibrate Play
item.description: Learn a rigorous, step by step method to design adaptive difficulty in procedural games using clear signals, guardrails, and validation loops.

item.title: HDR Streaming for Cloud Gamers: Key Considerations
item.description: Master HDR streaming for cloud gaming with practical guidance on tone mapping, bitrate, latency, codecs, color volume, and display setup to keep highlights crisp and controls responsive.

item.title: Measure Money Velocity in Virtual Worlds
item.description: Learn how to calculate money velocity in virtual worlds with clean data, time windows, and supply definitions. Includes formulas, validation checks, a compact script, and troubleshooting tips.

item.title: How to Build Dialogue Trees for Games Step by Step
item.description: Learn a clear, practical process to plan, script, and test dialogue trees for games with states, variables, and tools like Ink or Twine. Includes validation steps and troubleshooting tips.

item.title: Computer Vision for Binary Analysis: Visual Signals
item.description: Learn how visual signals from binaries enable computer vision models to spot malware traits, segment code regions, and prioritize triage. Compare encodings, choose features, and avoid common pitfalls.

item.title: AI Technology Companies: From Chips to Applications
item.description: Explore AI technology companies across chips, infrastructure, models, and applications. See choices, examples, tradeoffs, and how to align spend with outcomes.

item.title: AI in Financial Markets: Signals, Liquidity, and Risk
item.description: Understand how AI extracts signals, maps liquidity, and manages risk in financial markets with clear frameworks, examples, and practical tradeoffs grounded in data workflows and controls.

item.title: Retail Computer Vision: Heatmaps, Loss Prevention, Insight
item.description: Learn how retail computer vision powers heatmaps, loss prevention, and store insight. See patterns, tradeoffs, and workflows to move from pixels to actions.

item.title: Smart Pole Street Lighting: Integrating Light, Sensors, Power
item.description: Learn how smart pole street lighting integrates luminaires, sensors, networking, and power to improve safety, efficiency, and data quality with clear frameworks and tradeoffs.

item.title: How to Organize ROMs and BIOS Files Efficiently
item.description: Learn a fast, lawful system to organize ROMs and BIOS files with clear folder structure, naming, and verification so emulators find what they need every time.

item.title: Lightmap UV Unwrapping for Static Lighting
item.description: Learn how to unwrap lightmap UVs for clean static lighting in game engines. Plan scale, margins, and seams, then execute in Blender or DCC and validate for overlaps, bleeding, and leaks.

item.title: Tilemap-Based Level Generation: Grids with Personality
item.description: Learn how tilemap based level generation works, from adjacency rules and constraints to noise and graph overlays, with practical tradeoffs for playability and performance.

item.title: GPU Encoder vs Software Encoder for Streaming Games
item.description: Compare GPU and software encoders for game streaming across latency, quality, bitrate, and hardware load. See when NVENC, AMF, or x264 fits, plus tuning tips for stable play.

item.title: Forecasting Item Prices in Games: Methods That Help
item.description: Learn a stepwise process to forecast item prices in games using baselines, time series models, and validation tactics, with guardrails for shocks, exploits, and live ops decisions.

item.title: Dialogue Tree Tools Comparison for Narrative Design
item.description: Compare dialogue tree tools for narrative design with clear criteria, tradeoffs, and scenarios. Learn how branching depth, testing, and pipelines shape tool fit for your game.

item.title: Artificial General Intelligence: Security Implications
item.description: Explore how artificial general intelligence could reshape cybersecurity risks and defenses, from autonomy and misuse to safeguards, governance, and practical decision lenses for security leaders evaluating real systems today.

item.title: AI Tech Companies: New Entrants Shaping the Future
item.description: See seven emerging types of AI tech companies, with examples, tradeoffs, and buying signals to evaluate fit. Learn how new entrants change stacks, costs, and governance.

item.title: AI in Financial Institutions: Operating Model Shifts
item.description: Learn how AI reshapes financial institutions through new operating models, data supply chains, risk controls, and governance. See decision lenses, scenarios, and tradeoffs that align innovation with safety and measurable outcomes.

item.title: Use of AI in the Retail Industry: From Plan to Payoff
item.description: Learn how retailers apply AI across forecasting, replenishment, planograms, and assortments, with decision frameworks, examples, and tradeoffs that connect planning choices to measurable payoff.

item.title: Smart Pole Street Lighting Layout: Spacing and Sightlines
item.description: Design a smart pole street lighting layout with proven spacing, mounting height, and sightline methods. Follow step by step planning, field checks, code-aided spacing, and verification.

item.title: How to Dump BIOS from Your Console Safely
item.description: Learn a lawful, step by step method to dump your console BIOS safely, verify integrity, and avoid corruption. Follow clear tools, backups, and checks to protect hardware and data.

item.title: Import Settings for Textures and Models: A Setup Guide
item.description: Configure import settings for textures and 3D models in Unity, Unreal, and Godot. Follow a practical plan, apply presets, validate results, and fix common pitfalls for clean, performant assets.

item.title: Terrain Stitching and Chunking: Seamless Streaming
item.description: Learn how to stitch terrain tiles and stream chunks seamlessly with LOD, skirts, and async IO. Step by step planning through validation with profiling and fallback strategies.

item.title: Frame Pacing vs Bitrate Spikes: Keep Motion Stable
item.description: Learn how frame pacing interacts with bitrate spikes in cloud gaming. Diagnose visual stutter versus compression artifacts, choose encoder settings wisely, and keep motion stable across variable networks.

item.title: Elasticity of Demand for Cosmetic Items Explained
item.description: Learn how to measure and interpret elasticity of demand for cosmetic items in game economies, with frameworks, examples, and tradeoffs to guide pricing and event design.

item.title: Dialogue Node Systems for Choice-Heavy Games
item.description: Learn how dialogue node systems structure choices, track state, and manage consequences in narrative-heavy games with practical frameworks, examples, and pitfalls to avoid.

item.title: AI GPU Considerations for Security-Scale Models
item.description: Plan GPU choices for security-scale AI models with clear sizing rules, throughput targets, memory math, and tradeoffs across precision, batching, and latency.

item.title: Companies Using AI: Cross-Industry Moves That Matter
item.description: See how companies use AI across industries with concrete patterns, vendor choices, and governance guardrails. Learn build versus buy tradeoffs, examples, and a practical roadmap for scaling value while managing risk and change.

item.title: AI for Financial Markets: Tools, Data, and Workflows
item.description: Learn how AI improves financial markets with practical tools, reliable data sources, and repeatable workflows that balance alpha discovery, risk control, and governance across trading, analytics, and oversight.

item.title: Store Replenishment Automation with AI: From Rules to ML
item.description: Learn how to automate store replenishment with AI, from setting demand signals to deploying ML reorder logic, validating accuracy, and resolving edge cases.

item.title: NB‑IoT Street Lighting Gateways: Selection and Placement
item.description: Compare NB‑IoT street lighting gateways against direct nodes and hybrid bridges. Learn selection criteria, placement rules, and scenario fit for reliable, scalable control.

item.title: Game Dumping Best Practices for Preservation
item.description: Follow a proven workflow for accurate game dumping that preserves data, reduces errors, and validates integrity with hashes. Learn media handling, format choices, and verification to keep archives future proof.

item.title: How to Organize Game Project Folders That Scale
item.description: Learn a practical folder strategy for game projects with naming rules, presets, automation scripts, and validation checks to prevent chaos as teams grow and platforms multiply.

item.title: Pathfinding-Aware Level Generation: Design for Flow
item.description: Learn how to make level generation account for pathfinding from the start, using constraints, metrics, and cost maps to create fair, readable, and flowing play spaces.

item.title: Encoding Presets for Low‑Latency Gaming: Top Choices
item.description: Choose the right encoding presets for fluid, low-latency gaming. Compare NVENC, x264, AMF, and AV1 options, with zero-latency tuning, rate control choices, and practical tradeoffs for different GPUs and networks.

item.title: Cohort Analysis for Earn and Spend in Games
item.description: Learn how to run cohort analysis on player earn and spend to diagnose sinks, sources, and balance issues. Get definitions, decision lenses, scenarios, and practical tradeoffs for live ops.

item.title: Decision Tree Templates for Interactive Stories
item.description: Explore six proven decision tree templates for interactive stories. Learn when to use each pattern, see examples, and weigh tradeoffs for pacing, agency, and production scope.

item.title: AI Data Pipelines for Threat Intelligence Enrichment
item.description: Build an AI-driven pipeline that enriches threat intelligence with model scores and context. Plan sources, choose transport and storage, run steps, validate outputs, and fix common issues.

item.title: What Is AI in Business Intelligence? Key Concepts
item.description: Learn what AI in business intelligence means, how it works, and where it fits. Explore architecture patterns, model choices, and dashboard examples that improve reporting and decision speed.

item.title: AI Finance Trading: From Signal to Execution Quality
item.description: Learn how AI connects market signals to execution quality in trading. Explore definitions, decision frameworks, realistic examples, and risk-aware limits for data, models, and routing.

item.title: Retail AI Technology: Platforms, Patterns, and Proof
item.description: Learn how retail AI technology works across platforms and patterns, how to evaluate choices, and what proof points matter for forecasting, replenishment, and assortments.

item.title: LoRaWAN Street Light Controllers: Range, Power, and Scale
item.description: Compare LoRaWAN street light controllers against Wi‑Fi, Zigbee, NB‑IoT, and 5G. Weigh range, power, density, latency, and lifecycle costs with scenario‑based recommendations for cities and campuses.

item.title: Dolphin Keys and the Wii Common Key Explained
item.description: Learn how Dolphin uses title keys and the Wii common key, what each does, where configuration lives, and legal guardrails for ethical emulation.

item.title: Content Streaming for Open Worlds: Flow Without Gaps
item.description: Learn how open worlds stream content without hitching using regions, budgets, and predictive loading. Compare paging models, I/O constraints, and LOD tradeoffs across platforms with practical decision tools.

item.title: Dungeon Generation Algorithms: Patterns and Tradeoffs
item.description: Compare dungeon generation algorithms through concrete patterns, examples, and tradeoffs. Learn when to choose BSP, cellular automata, WFC, walkers, or graph grammars.

item.title: Dynamic Bitrate Ladders for Cloud Games: Build Smart
item.description: Learn how to design dynamic bitrate ladders for cloud games that adapt to motion, network jitter, and device limits while keeping latency tight and visuals stable.

item.title: Build a Virtual Economy Dashboard Step‑By‑Step
item.description: Learn how to plan, build, and validate a virtual economy dashboard with reliable KPIs, data models, and alerts. Follow actionable steps, code, and tests to avoid bias and drift.

item.title: Choice Architecture in Game Writing: Shaping Player Intent
item.description: Learn how choice architecture in game writing guides player intent, reduces confusion, and sustains story momentum with clear options, readable consequences, and fair feedback that respects agency across quests and scenes.

item.title: AI/ML for Malware Detection: Architectures and Data
item.description: Explore AI and ML architectures for malware detection, from data sourcing and features to model choices, evaluation, and deployment patterns that scale securely in enterprise environments.
